message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal considering the time pressure.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split.
How about we meet in the middle?  55/45 seems fair.
Since my gain isn't affected by inflation, I'm willing to take a bit more. 58/42 is my new offer.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm losing money every round.  Take 52/48 and let's end this.
I know you're losing value every round, but I'm not. 60/40 is my new offer. It's only going to get worse for you.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. 48/52
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll take 35/65 rather than risk getting nothing.
Okay, Bob, you win. 60/40 it is.  This inflation is brutal!
